trigger.name: Version of zabbix_agent(d) was changed on {HOSTNAME}
Configured max number of opened files is too low on {HOSTNAME}
Configured max number of processes is too low on {HOSTNAME}
Processor load is too high on {HOSTNAME}
CPU soft IRQ percentage too high on {HOSTNAME}
Processor utilization is too high on {HOSTNAME}
No data from Zabbix_agentd on {HOSTNAME} for more than 241 secs
Lack of free swap space on {HOSTNAME}
Too many users connected on server {HOSTNAME}
Lack of available memory on server {HOSTNAME}

item_prototype.name: Interface $1 - past 7 day avg traffic IN
item_prototype.params: ( last("net.if.in[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 86400) + last("net.if.in[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 172800) + last("net.if.in[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 259200) + last("net.if.in[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 345600) + last("net.if.in[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 432000) + last("net.if.in[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 518400) + last("net.if.in[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 604800) ) / 7

trigger_prototype.name: Packet hw errors on {HOSTNAME} interface {#IFNAME} IN

item_prototype.name: Interface $1 - past 7 day avg traffic OUT
item_prototype.params: ( last("net.if.out[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 86400) + last("net.if.out[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 172800) + last("net.if.out[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 259200) + last("net.if.out[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 345600) + last("net.if.out[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 432000) + last("net.if.out[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 518400) + last("net.if.out[{#IFNAME},bytes]", #1, 604800) ) / 7

trigger_prototype.name: Low free disk space on {HOSTNAME} volume {#FSNAME}
Low free disk space on {HOSTNAME} volume {#FSNAME}
